description: {"blocks":[{"key":"bbbes","text":"Wastewater based epidemiology has proven to be a useful tool in the COVID-19 pandemic, allowing prevalence and variant and sub-lineage surveillance on a watershed population level in a non-intrusive manner.  Essential to this method is the efficient extraction of viral genomic material from wastewater.  The process of detecting SARS Co-V-2 genetic signatures in wastewater samples involves collection of water, either as a grab sample or as a 24-hour composite sample, followed by sample concentration. Target genetic material may be present at a low concentration in water samples,  making sample concentration a prerequisite for sensitive detection. Concentration of microbial matter can be performed using a variety of methods, such as charged membrane filtration, centrifugal ultrafiltration and flocculation/precipitation using skim milk or polyethylene glycol (PEG)/NaCl. Most of the concentration methods were originally developed to concentrate live matter with the objective of culturing for detection of intact particles, though they have also been used for PCR-based detection. These methods have proven to be inconsistent, labor intensive and time consuming.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13cvr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2gmc9","text":"More and more SC2-wastewater specific methods have recently been developed.  We have assessed the Promega Wizard Enviro Total Nucleic Acid kit for extraction of RNA for downstream SC2 detection and sequencing.  Briefly, the method directly captures and concentrates total nucleic acids (TNA) from a large volume of water using PureYield™ columns. The method uses a short protocol that minimizes the need for specialized laboratory equipment. In a first step total nucleic acid from a large volume sample (e.g., 40ml of wastewater) is captured on a PureYield™ Binding Column and then eluted in 1ml. In a second step, the material is further purified and concentrated using the PureYield™ Minicolumn. This method achieves consistent recovery rates and significant reduction in PCR inhibitors.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6fu3j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ccsea","text":"The total nucleic acid extracted using this kit can be analyzed for SARS-CoV-2 targets using a SARS-CoV-2 RT-qPCR","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"890vn","text":"kit for wastewater. Please visit the Promega website for more information on these products:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b07h6","text":"https://www.promega.com/applications/infectious-diseases/covid19-wastewater-sars-cov-2-detection/.  Additionally, the extracted RNA can be utilized for SC2 variant sequencing: Enhanced QIAseq DIRECT SARS-CoV-2 Kit for Illumina MiSeq (protocols.io), or Modified NEBNext® VarSkip Short SARS-CoV-2 Library Prep Kit for Illumina Platforms - adapted for wastewater samples (protocols.io).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":97},{"key":1,"offset":176,"length":71},{"key":2,"offset":252,"length":130}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D6111AC6DB7311ECB2330A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.promega.com/applications/infectious-diseases/covid19-wastewater-sars-cov-2-detection"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2CE6A441DB7411ECB2330A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/enhanced-qiaseq-direct-sars-cov-2-kit-for-illumina-rm7vzy39rlx1/v3"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"471E020BDB7411ECB2330A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/modified-nebnext-varskip-short-sars-cov-2-library-5jyl89n26v2w/v3"}}}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"6uds4","text":"Wizard® Enviro Total Nucleic Acid Kit, Promega cat# A2991 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5n3dt","text":"Contains sufficient materials and reagents for 25 samples. Includes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4v1cv","text":"• 1 × 13ml Protease Solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"278i5","text":"• 1 × 320ml Binding Buffer 1 (BBD)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"592du","text":"• 1 × 30ml Binding Buffer 2 (BBE)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8pir5","text":"• 1 × 85.3ml Column Wash 1(CWE)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhjbv","text":"• 1 × 206ml Column Wash 2 (RWA)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"80qvr","text":"• 1 × 150ml Nuclease-Free Water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cl8pp","text":"• 5 × 5 each PureYield™ Binding Minicolumns","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86h8c","text":"• 1 × 25 each PureYield™ Collection Tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhovf","text":"• 1 × 50 each Elution Tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3pjre","text":"• 1 × 25 each Reservoir Extension Funnel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1e42d","text":"Storage Conditions: Store all components at +15°C to +30°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1d1jh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhpka","text":"Materials to Be Supplied by the User","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7gk3","text":"• isopropanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bqqf","text":"• ethanol, 95%","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jsuk","text":"• tabletop centrifuge (capable of 3,000 × g)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5roat","text":"• swinging bucket rotor (that accommodates 50ml tubes)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97f3r","text":"• 50ml disposable plastic screw-cap tubes (e.g., Corning® or Falcon® brand)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3us4v","text":"• 1.5ml microcentrifuge tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f80b6","text":"• heat block (capable of reaching 60°C)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74umf","text":"• high-speed microcentrifuge (for tubes, capable of at least 10,000rpm)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"98s2c","text":"• vacuum manifold (e.g., Vac-Man® Laboratory Vacuum Manifold, Cat.# A7231)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65dch","text":"• Eluator™ Vacuum Elution Device (Cat.# A1071)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7l66","text":"• vacuum pump, single- or double-stage, producing pressure of approximately 650mm Hg (25.6 inches Hg,","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"476f5","text":"12.57psi, 86.7kPa).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
